TopicTitle: No "review stored data" option after EVA

Articles.Content: So I am trying to grind out some science around minimus in low orbit doing EVA's over different bioms. After getting back in the pod however I see not option to "review data" which is what I would use to transmit it of I wanted.  What am I missing here?

You missed many things:

  • First of all any info on if you are playing stock or a modded install (considering the fact you asked on the modded installs thread i would presume you play modded KSP)
  • If you play a modded install at least a modlist or a log file containing info on the mods you are using
  • Any reproduction steps. What you did before? How you achieved the bug? What parts you were using? etc.

I would suggest reading this first:
